abstract.p: Saatchi & Saatchi Worldwide chairwoman-chief executive Jennifer Laing and vice chairman Tony Dalton will leave at end of November as part of reorganization in light of Publicis Groupe SA's acquisition of ad agency; Julie Bauer, Keith Bunnell, Mike Burns, Tom Lom, Tim Love, Marie McNeely, Mike Popernick and Tod Seisser are appointed vice presidents and managing partners (S)

block.p: Two senior executives at Saatchi & Saatchi in New York, which was acquired this week by the Publicis Groupe S.A., are leaving at the end of November as part of a reorganization.

The executives, who head Saatchi's North American operation, are Jennifer Laing, 53, chairwoman and chief executive, and Tony Dalton, vice chairman. Their posts will not be filled; rather, these eight high-level management and creative executives will oversee the agency's offices in New York, San Francisco and Toronto as executive vice presidents and managing partners: Julie Bauer, Keith Bunnell, Mike Burns, Tom Lom, Tim Love, Marie McNeely, Mike Popernick and Tod Seisser. They will report to Kevin Roberts, worldwide chief executive.

Ms. Laing and Mr. Dalton, a longtime couple, plan to return to Britain, where he will pursue his avocation, horse breeding, and she will take time off before her next move.
